label: IT Technical Support
descp: I have a knack for solving technical issues, whether it's troubleshooting hardware, fixing software glitches, or resolving network problems.

label: Web Design
descp: I love designing websites that look great and make navigation easy. I’m always exploring ways to improve layout, style, and flow.
